entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
